abstracts.abstract: By Ms. Jehlen, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 767) of Patricia D. Jehlen for legislation relative to the divestment from entity which manufactures, produces, promotes, sells, or distributes holds weapons of mass destruction.  Financial Services.
